name: Super Rescue Princess
description:
Monsters have kidnapped the Princess' beloved knight!

Will you be able to help the peaceful Princess rescue her lover?

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Spacebar to Jump

X to Shoot

This Game was made for my Bachelor's Thesis!

I would greatly appreciate your help by filling out this short survey:

https://my.forms.app/form/62a8dd6dbd94a175bb9aaee3

Thank you very much!

-Erik
